mapper.insert: insert into sponsor(sponsor_no, member_no, gift_no, project_no, sponsor_amount) values(sponsor_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{giftNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectNo}, #{sponsorAmount})
mapper.select: select sum(sponsor_amount) from sponsor where project_no = #{projectNo} and sponsor_cancel is null
select count(*) from (select member_no from sponsor where project_no = #{projectNo} group by member_no)

select project_no, project_title, sum(sponsor_amount) sum_sponsor_amount from( select P.project_start_date, P.project_end_date, P.project_no, P.project_title, S.sponsor_amount from sponsor S left outer join project P on P.project_no = S.project_no where S.member_no = #{memberNo} and sysdate > P.project_start_date and P.project_end_date > sysdate and S.sponsor_cancel is null ) group by project_title, project_no

select project_no, project_title, sum(sponsor_amount) sum_sponsor_amount from( select P.project_start_date, P.project_end_date, P.project_no, P.project_title, S.sponsor_amount from sponsor S left outer join project P on P.project_no = S.project_no where S.member_no = #{memberNo} and P.project_end_date < sysdate and S.sponsor_cancel is null ) group by project_title, project_no

select project_no, project_title from( select P.project_start_date, P.project_no, P.project_title, S.sponsor_amount from sponsor S left outer join project P on P.project_no = S.project_no where S.member_no = #{memberNo} and sponsor_cancel = 'Y' ) group by project_title, project_no
select sum(sponsor_amount) sponsor_amount from sponsor where member_no = #{memberNo} and project_no = #{projectNo} and sponsor_cancel is null group by project_no, member_no

select S.sponsor_no, S.member_no, G.gift_no, G.gift_summary, S.project_no, S.sponsor_amount, to_char(S.sponsor_date) sponsor_date from sponsor S left outer join gift G on S.gift_no = G.gift_no where S.project_no = #{projectNo} and S.sponsor_cancel is null and S.member_no = #{memberNo} order by S.sponsor_amount desc

select S.sponsor_no, S.member_no, G.gift_no, G.gift_summary, S.project_no, S.sponsor_amount, to_char(S.sponsor_date) sponsor_date from sponsor S left outer join gift G on S.gift_no = G.gift_no where S.project_no = #{projectNo} and S.sponsor_cancel = 'Y' and S.member_no = #{memberNo} order by S.sponsor_amount desc
mapper.update: update sponsor set sponsor_cancel = 'Y' where sponsor_no = #{sponsorNo} and member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select * from sponsor where sponsor_no = #{sponsorNo} and member_no = #{memberNo}
